description:
Getting to ski from opening to close is hard enough without having to think about your socks. Think no more with these Full Cushion Midnight ski socks. With its mesh zones, dialed fit and seamless toe, you’ll have no excuses not to tick off every run on the mountain.

  • 4 Degree™ Elite Fit System combines two elastics so you get a snug fit and precise control while on the slopes
  • Indestructawool™ blend improves durability in high-wear areas
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe to keep your toes comfy while you shred the slopes
  • Wider welt for a secure and pillowy fit
  • Mesh vent zones provide temperature and moisture management
name: Smartwool Ski Full Cushion Midnight Ski Pattern OTC Socks - Women's
